name: PacoCards - addicting cardgame
description:
Warning! Absolutely Addicting! In this game you have to select cards to sum up to evelyn points to clear the cardboard. Hurry up! Time is running! This game is en excellent way to train your brain, too!
Your goal is to eliminate all cards on the screen by selecting as many cards as necessary to sum up to exactly 11 points. If you need another cards, click "P".
